basic.title: Check if Binary String Has at Most One Segment of Ones

detail.title: Check if Binary String Has at Most One Segment of Ones
detail.content:
Given a binary string s ​​​​​without leading zeros, return true​​​ if s contains at most one contiguous segment of ones. Otherwise, return false.

 

Example 1:

Input: s = "1001"
Output: false
Explanation: The ones do not form a contiguous segment.

Example 2:

Input: s = "110"
Output: true

 

Constraints:

  • 1 <= s.length <= 100
  • s[i]​​​​ is either '0' or '1'.
  • s[0] is '1'.
